prompt: Create a vibrant underwater scene highlighting sprawling coral formations teeming with life. The corals exhibit an array of colors from deep purples to bright oranges and reds. Sea anemones sway gently in the current, and schools of exotic fish weave through the crevices. Gentle light rays filter through the clear blue water, illuminating the reef and creating a magical, ethereal ambiance. The art style should be bright and detailed, capturing the stunning natural beauty and intricate details of the underwater world in an uncommon rarity fashion.
